titleStmt.title: A bold challenge of an itinerant preacher modestly answered by a local minister to whom the same was sent and delivered: and severall letters thereupon.
titleStmt.author: Griffith, George, 1601-1666.
Powell, Vavasor, 1617-1670.

notesStmt.note: Includes a letter signed on page [6]: 19 day of Jun. 1652. Red Castle. Vavasor Powell.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 10". Inserted in title after 'preacher": "V.P."; after 'minister': "G.G.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
